tool_description: Configures signal collection parameters including frequency ranges, geographic coverage areas, and collection priorities for intelligence gathering operations.

frequency_start_mhz.description: Starting frequency in MHz for signal collection range

frequency_end_mhz.description: Ending frequency in MHz for signal collection range

geographic_bounds.description: Geographic coordinates defining collection area [lat_min, lon_min, lat_max, lon_max]

collection_priority.description: Priority level for collection: low, medium, high, critical

error_messages: Invalid frequency range: frequency_start_mhz must be less than frequency_end_mhz and both must be positive
Geographic bounds error: Must provide exactly 4 coordinates [lat_min, lon_min, lat_max, lon_max] with valid latitude (-90 to 90) and longitude (-180 to 180) ranges
Invalid priority level: collection_priority must be one of [low, medium, high, critical]
Duration out of range: duration_hours must be between 1 and 168 hours
usage: Set frequency_start_mhz and frequency_end_mhz to define the signal spectrum to monitor, provide geographic_bounds array with coordinates, specify collection_priority, and optionally set duration_hours for the collection period.

configuration_id.description: Unique identifier for this collection configuration

coverage_area_km2.description: Total geographic coverage area in square kilometers

bandwidth_mhz.description: Total frequency bandwidth configured in MHz
